> Perceptor looking to Rodimus said "Go and learn what Zarak
> is into... after that Report to hdyras what is happening as well
> as our own plans, I need to do a trip and find the Ark before
> the mouse arrives"

Rodimus nodded to Perceptor, a sly look on his face, happy it wasn't
he that was in trouble this time. Gears grinding he shifted into his
sporty looking truck mode with the flaming motif. However instead of
the reds and yellows, he was still silvers and black with a white
flame.

With a rev of his engines he moved off in search of Zarak, who was now
Scorponok!

*****************************

Meanwhile both Cyclonus and Scourge were already in motion as
Perceptor's call came over the channel's. As the base came alert in
search of prisoners, Cyclonus and Scourge had taken off to help in the
search. It took only a few minutes to catchup with the others,
although Scourge's sensors were quickly leading them in the right
direction anyway. In a few moments they quickly arrived in the room
where Tuscon had fallen and that Rat trap had left from.

"Yes" Scourge grated out, "I have the little Maximal's scent. I will
catch him!" Scourge and Cyclonus began to help in the search for the
tiny Maximal!

Preston
(Cyclonus/Scourge/Rodimus)
